snippet: Mr. McIntyre was a founding member of the Association for the Advancement of Creative Musicians and occasionally performed in face paint and tribal costume.
abstract: Kalaparusha Maurice McIntyre, saxophonist who was a founding member of avante-garde coalition known as the Association for the Advancement of Creative Musicians, dies at age 77.
lead_paragraph: Mr. McIntyre was a founding member of the Association for the Advancement of Creative Musicians and occasionally performed in face paint and tribal costume.

headline.main: Kalaparusha Maurice McIntyre, Tenor Saxophonist, Dies at 77
headline.print_headline: Kalaparusha Maurice McIntyre, 77, Pioneering Tenor Saxophonist

keywords.value: Assn for the Advancement of Creative Musicians
keywords.name: organizations
